message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000.  It's a great deal for a valuable item. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I really need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,500 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is still a great deal considering the value of this product.  Let's meet in the middle!
I understand that you're willing to come down, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $10,250. Can you consider that?
